channel.title: [PI] Loads of Problems [PI]
channel.description:
First, I realize that some of these things I am having problems with might be client sided and im posting in server sided section of the forums.
BASE/SOURCE) PI, RuneVerfix
PROBLEM 1) Ancient curses are added to my client, but not to the server. How can I add them server sided?
PROBLEM 2) None of the prayers light up when you click them on the client. How can I fix this?
PROBLEM 3) When I spawn a chaotic maul it is a null, but in the item.cfg chaotic maul is added with and item id and stats.. So how would I add the models to make it not a null?
PROBLEM 4) The item royal shit" has the same models as royal leggings. How do I change the models for the shirt?
Please soon feed me, that seems to be the best way for me to learn.. when someone breaks down the basics I can understand more. And I have looked for the fixes to my problems, so posting "use the search button" doesnt help at all.

item.title: [PI] Loads of Problems [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Gsempire Gsempire
item.description:
@Gsempire wrote:

First, I realize that some of these things I am having problems with might be client sided and im posting in server sided section of the forums.

BASE/SOURCE) PI, RuneVerfix

PROBLEM 1) Ancient curses are added to my client, but not to the server. How can I add them server sided?

PROBLEM 2) None of the prayers light up when you click them on the client. How can I fix this?

PROBLEM 3) When I spawn a chaotic maul it is a null, but in the item.cfg chaotic maul is added with and item id and stats… So how would I add the models to make it not a null?

PROBLEM 4) The item royal shit" has the same models as royal leggings. How do I change the models for the shirt?

Please soon feed me, that seems to be the best way for me to learn… when someone breaks down the basics I can understand more.
And I have looked for the fixes to my problems, so posting “use the search button” doesnt help at all.
